name: Cascade Air LLC
about: Cascade Air LLC is a family-owned flying school and Fixed-Base Operator (FBO) at the Southwest Washington Regional Airport in Kelso, WA. Founded by aviation enthusiasts Jessica Statham, her husband Hudson Frost, and her father David Statham, the company is dedicated to promoting general aviation and inspiring the next generation of pilots. With a team of experienced instructors, including Dan Evans, a veteran with over 42,000 hours of flight time, and other skilled professionals, Cascade Air offers private aircraft training, in-person ground schools, and aircraft rentals. The facility provides fuel services, maintenance, and complimentary vehicles for travelers. Committed to safety and community, Cascade Air aims to make Kelso a vibrant destination for aviation enthusiasts, fostering a passion for flying and supporting pilots at every level of their aviation journey.
